content:

thought: To craft a dark_oak_boat, I need to place three dark_oak_planks in the first row of the crafting grid, then two more planks in the second row. I will start by moving one plank from slot 13 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 13 to slot 1 with quantity 1
